extendedInfo.description: Destination East Africa is the comprehensive source of information and tools to enable travelers to East Africa plan and have memorable trips.It offers trusted reviews, booking tools, photo galleries, and real-time navigation directions to their destinations. The app features tourist attractions, hotels, restaurants, shopping malls and many more coming soon.Now available for Ugandan destinations!

reviews.title: Like it!
reviews.comment: Just downloaded it. It\'s a great app indeed. Kudos to you guys. Just need to add some more places. N the website tab doesn\'t really work. otw it\'s a great one.
reviews.author: Arthur Mugoya
